111450000.text: How is it, {NICKNAME}? Are you at the Goethe Hotel?

111450002.text: So efficient, as expected of you

111450004.text: Norbert said the secret signal he set with Mr. Cold Feet was three light knocks, then two heavy knocks

111450006.text: Now it's all up to your silver tongue, {NICKNAME}

111450007.text: You can do it! I believe in you

111450005.text: Don't be scared. You can do this

111460000.text: Pela, I caught Mr. Cold Feet

111460003.text: I thought he's turned over a new leaf, but...

111460004.text: I'm coming over right now, {NICKNAME}! Wait for me where you are. Don't let him get away!

111470001.text: Looks like Mr. Cold Feet isn't in the hotel anymore

111470003.text: Don't be upset, {NICKNAME}. These things happen

111470004.text: I'll come over to inspect the place soon. Wait for me in the hotel

111480001.text: I'm inviting Gepard to be a Museum volunteer guide

111480002.text: But he says he's already submitted the application form

111480003.text: Do you know anything about this?

111480004.text: Hold on. Lemme have a look

111480006.text: I found his application. It got squashed between other documents

111480007.text: I haven't looked at it yet

111480008.text: Please let him know to prepare for the interview

111480009.text: Oh, by the way, you don't need to be the assistant assessor this time

111480023.text: After all, you've been working hard for the museum all this time

111480024.text: I need to head off now. Please let Gepard know about the interview

111480015.option: So I'm no longer useful to you?

111480016.text: So, it seems like I'm no longer of use to you...

111480019.text: Hey, you know that's not true.

111480020.text: And stop pretending to get offended when you're getting a free pass to chill.

111480022.text: I just want you to have a rest. I don't mean anything else

200190000.text: The Tale of the Winterlands original artbook sold out in 1 second again

200190002.text: I was fast enough to get you a copy too

200190010.text: Sorry, I messaged the wrong person

200190012.text: I can tell that you like this book a lot
200190012.option: You like this book a lot

200190013.text: Tale of the Winterlands is the best book ever!

200190014.text: I can give you a set if you're interested

200190020.text: Yeah. I bought <unbreak>10</unbreak> sets, so I can recommend it to people who are interested

200190015.text: Is it possible for you to give me a copy as well
200190015.option: Can you give me one as well

200190016.text: Not the artbook. I got that for my friend

200190017.text: But if you're interested, I can give you a set of the Tale of the Winterlands

200370002.text: Hey, do you know how any way to stave off sleepiness?

200370007.text: What do you mean no good?

200370010.text: I'm writing a script for the upcoming Tales exchange

200370011.text: To meet the deadline, I haven't slept for three days and three nights... I'm super sleepy now

200370013.text: Small talk's over, I need to finish it before the deadline

200370018.text: I do have some ways to help you get sober
200370018.option: I do have some ways to help you get sober

200370019.text: But I'm not sure if you're up to it

200370022.text: I am writing a script for the upcoming Tales exchange

200370023.text: To meet the deadline, I haven't slept for three days and three nights... I'm super sleepy now

200370024.text: It's one of our senior crew member's coffee
200370024.option: I recommend the Express Crew's coffee

200370028.text: Could you bring me some? Thanks!

200370031.text: You'll feel sober when you wake up after sleeping

200370032.text: I've tried it myself, and it worked for me

200370034.text: Everyone knows that sleeping will work

200370035.text: I am writing a script for the upcoming Tales exchange

200370036.text: To meet the deadline, I haven't slept for three days and three nights... I'm super sleepy now

200370037.text: Small talk's over, I need to finish it before the deadline

200380002.text: The next performance of Mechanical Fever is about to start. You coming?

200380006.text: I've been a fan of Mechanical Fever for <unbreak>10</unbreak> years!

200380009.text: Anyway, if you are coming, I'll save a good seat for you

200380010.text: Don't forget to buy flowers for us, you'll probably get called up on stage

200380011.option: It's better not to go then...

200380012.text: It's better not to go then...

200380015.text: You agreed to come, you can't back out now!

200380017.option: I will definitely go next time

200380018.text: I will definitely go next time

200380016.option: I will definitely go next time

200380020.text: You said last time that you've been a fan for <unbreak>10</unbreak> years

200380022.text: Do you have a recording? I can watch that instead

200380025.text: I think that's a good idea...

200380026.text: I've never recorded our own performance with a phone before, but I'll send it to you if I can

200380027.text: Ah, it's a pity you can't be there

200380028.text: Let me know if you change your mind. I'll try to get you a seat

121400022.text: I was very happy when I went out camping on that day

121400024.text: No need to be so polite

121400025.text: Let's head out again together when you're free

121400026.text: And don't forget about the supper

121400030.text: As for supper... I would like some time to myself today, actually

121400014.text: ...I can tell from your reaction that you definitely heard it

121400015.option: What was I supposed to hear?

121990003.text: Recently, a batch of scraps that don't meet the construction standards have been filtered out at the Pillars of Creation

121990004.text: The staff casually piled these scraps aside for the sake of convenience

121990005.text: But they all disappeared, so I'm suspecting misappropriation

121990006.text: It wouldn't have been a big deal if those scraps aren't that low quality. It'd be bad if someone used it to build a house

121990007.text: If you have any clues, come find me at the work site

info.name: Pela
info.signature: Please include your name when providing information
